metadata.synopsis: One liner for the zombie that was just raised by a necromancer vendor in Sorcerous Sundries.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get close to CTY_Main_A 14; 26; -77 and talk to the zombie that gets raised.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The zombie is still watching. Still hungry.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The newborn zombie gazes at you hungrily, pus drooling from its slack jaw.*
